description:
TRIOS is a game about numbers and the fun you can have with them. Deceptively simple, surprisingly challenging.

Select two numbers and one operator, then watch them combine to create a new number. Use all your numbers to reach the target.

Features:
- Journey mode: A series of puzzles with escalating difficulty
- Infinite mode: Randomly generated puzzles that adapt difficulty to your pace
- A selection of chill tunes and beautiful backgrounds to guide you into flow
name: TRIOS - lofi beats / numbers to chill to
